name: Clustify Input File
summary: A CYI file is a plain text file used by Clustify, a document clustering application developed by Hot Neuron. It stores information that acts as an input list, telling Clustify which documents to process during a clustering or deduplication task. Each line in a CYI file typically includes the path to a document, along with optional metadata, such as a document ID or custodian name.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
